resources.string: Gallery will analyse similar photos and mark best shots for you.
"Couldn't cancel authorisation for viewing on TV"
Optimising items frees up storage space on your device
Keep optimised photos on your device. Original files will be stored in Xiaomi Cloud.
Authorise viewing items on TVs associated with your Xiaomi Account
Gallery needs templates to be able to create memories locally on this device. We recommend using WLAN to download templates.
"Not enough photos to recognise people. Take more photos of your friends!"
"Looks like your device isn't connected to WLAN. Download the plug-in using mobile data?"
Gallery will analyse similar photos and mark best shots for you. Turn this feature off to remove marks from photos.

"Select photos with your face to personalise Gallery"
"Couldn't recognise text. This image format isn't supported."
"Couldn't recognise text. This image is too big."
"Couldn't recognise text. This image is too long."
Recognise text displayed on images to be able to select it or take action
Recognising text using mobile data might generate additional carrier fees. Recognise anyway?

"We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. This app needs the following permissions to work normally:

Using camera (for setting your profile photo)

If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you. You can always restrict permissions or revoke your authorisation in the Settings."
